ComponentDefinition.LayoutDefinition:
<![CDATA[<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-16"?> <LayoutDefinition xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema">
<Layout Name="Button" Type="RootLayout">
<TableAttributes> <Attribute> <Name>cellspacing</Name> <AttributeValue>0</AttributeValue> </Attribute> <Attribute> <Name>cellpadding</Name> <AttributeValue>0</AttributeValue> </Attribute> <Attribute> <Name>border</Name> <AttributeValue>0</AttributeValue> </Attribute> <Attribute> <Name>onclick</Name> <AttributeValue>clickLinkButtonText(this, event);</AttributeValue> </Attribute> </TableAttributes>
<Prolog> <Value></Value> </Prolog>
<Row> <Cell> <CellAttributes> <Attribute> <Name>class</Name> <AttributeValue>mobileButtonTL</AttributeValue> </Attribute> </CellAttributes> <Value><img src="../Images/space.gif" alt="" style="height: 12px; width: 12px;" /></Value> </Cell>
<Cell> <CellAttributes> <Attribute> <Name>class</Name> <AttributeValue>mobileButtonT</AttributeValue> </Attribute> </CellAttributes> <Value><img src="../Images/space.gif" /></Value> </Cell>
<Cell> <CellAttributes> <Attribute> <Name>class</Name> <AttributeValue>mobileButtonTR</AttributeValue> </Attribute> </CellAttributes> <Value><img src="../Images/space.gif" alt="" style="height: 12px; width: 12px;" /></Value> </Cell> </Row>
<Row> <Cell> <CellAttributes> <Attribute> <Name>class</Name> <AttributeValue>mobileButtonL</AttributeValue> </Attribute> </CellAttributes> <Value><img src="../Images/space.gif" alt="" style="height: 40px; width: 12px;" /></Value> </Cell>
<Cell> <CellAttributes> <Attribute> <Name>class</Name> <AttributeValue>mobileButtonC</AttributeValue> </Attribute> </CellAttributes> <Value><img src="../Images/space.gif" alt="" /><GEN:LINKBUTTON NAME="Button"/></Value> </Cell>
<Cell> <CellAttributes> <Attribute> <Name>class</Name> <AttributeValue>mobileButtonR</AttributeValue> </Attribute> </CellAttributes> <Value><img src="../Images/space.gif" alt="" style="height: 40px; width: 12px;" /></Value> </Cell> </Row>
<Row> <Cell> <CellAttributes> <Attribute> <Name>class</Name> <AttributeValue>mobileButtonBL</AttributeValue> </Attribute> </CellAttributes> <Value><img src="../Images/space.gif" alt="" style="height: 12px; width: 12px;" /></Value> </Cell>
<Cell> <CellAttributes> <Attribute> <Name>class</Name> <AttributeValue>mobileButtonB</AttributeValue> </Attribute> </CellAttributes> <Value><img src="../Images/space.gif" alt="" /></Value> </Cell>
<Cell> <CellAttributes> <Attribute> <Name>class</Name> <AttributeValue>mobileButtonBR</AttributeValue> </Attribute> </CellAttributes> <Value><img src="../Images/space.gif" alt="" style="height: 12px; width: 12px;" /></Value> </Cell> </Row>
<Epilog> <Value></Value> </Epilog> </Layout>
</LayoutDefinition>]]>
